title: Easter chocolate nest cake
ingredients: ['For the Cake', '1 (150g) tub natural yoghurt', '3 eggs', '200g caster sugar', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '150ml vegetable oil', 'For the chocolate icing', '335g dark chocolate, at least 70% cocoa', '450g unsalted butter', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '475g icing sugar', '2 eggs', 'For Decoration', 'shop-bought chocolate eggs', '1 small chocolate chick (optional)']
